title: Wendy's Breakfast with The Sloppy Boys
itunes:title: Wendy's Breakfast with The Sloppy Boys
description:
The Sloppy Boys (Mike Hanford, Jefferson Dutton, Tim Kalpakis) join the 'boys to talk sloppy foods, the recording of their new album Paradiso, and to sample Wendy's new breakfast menu. Plus, the debut of an all new segment, Jingle All The Weigh.

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/the-humble-history-of-the_b_9721710

https://ohiohistorycentral.org/w/Wendy%27s#:~:text=Wendy%27s%20began%20on%20November%2015,food%2C%20in%20a%20family%20setting.

https://www.mcdonalds.com/us/en-us/about-us/our-history.html

https://www.wendys.com/wendys-story

https://www.cnn.com/interactive/2019/02/business/mcdonalds-breakfast-history-timeline/index.html

https://time.com/65504/fast-food-breakfast/


Advertise on Doughboys via Gumball.fm.
